ofx:section.ofx:title: Introduction
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: This web-based information system's architecture is based on several components that need to be set up in order to have a running instance of the software. The following steps are required:

l:item.ofx:paragraph: Setup the operating system and install a Java runtime environment.
Setup the service to serve and process geographical data stored in the database
Setup the Java EE application server
Deploy the application to the application server

ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: To provide the needed infrastructure, the following products have been chosen for their stability, long-term support and robustness:

l:item.ofx:paragraph: PostgreSQL as database with PostGIS extention to store geospatial data
GeoServer to serve and process geospatial data
JBoss Application Server as runtime environment for the Java EE web application

ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: Advanced users may choose to deploy the system to their own existing infrastructure, but may encounter issues that are not covered by this manual, since it describes the only supported setup to operate the software.
